Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

Hi, hope you're doing well. We'd need another invoice to make an additional 5K prepayment to fund our account, can you send at your earliest convenience? Company Details: Parkbell S.A, Address: 25 de Mayo 444, Montevideo, Uruguay, 11000. Contact: finance@babelmedia.global. Thanks!
On the other hand, what would the requirements be to access to a credit line?

Hi there! Thanks for reaching out. For prepayment and invoicing requests, please contact our support team directly at adsupport@newsbreak.com. Make sure to include your company details and the amount you wish to prepay in your email. They'll be able to assist you with generating an invoice for your account funding. Let me know if there's anything else I can help with!

To access a credit line on NewsBreak, your account must meet certain conditions. Firstly, your account needs to complete and pass business verification. Additionally, your account or campaign should have accumulated over $5,000 in spend. Establishing a relationship with an Account Manager (AM) is also necessary, as they can request the ad credit functionality to be enabled for you. If you need more details or assistance, feel free to reach out!
